title: Bhisma Na'kala Flamebrow
text:
High Elder Bhisma Na'kala of the [[Flamebrow Clan|Flamebrow Clanhold]] is the ruler of the [[dragonborn]] city of [[Ka'rhashan]]. He joined King [[Sebastes ir'Kesslan]] to represent [[Q'barra]] at the [[Treaty of Thronehold]] two years ago, and continues to advocate for peace.

Bhisma has called upon the [[dragonborn]] clans to hold to their ancient duties, and forbids attacks on [[human]] towns. But Bhismaâ€™s authority is far from absolute, and even those who respect his words will still butcher outsiders who trespass onto the unhallowed grounds that the dragonborn protect.
